q1: Does Cristiano Ronaldo is a part of this team?
a1: Yes, Cristiano just transferred to Juventus.
q2: Ronaldo will be playing in seria a
a2: If that is a question, yes he will e playing in Seria A
q3: Can Ronald take them to European success?
a3: Definitely, they have been close a few times recently.
q4: how many more wins will juventus have this year now that they have ronaldo
a4: It depends. One player alone does not make a whole team
q5: But Ronaldo will definitely increase the overall chances for the team, right?
a5: One of the best players in the world he better increase the odds.
